content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to watch documentaries or any other kind of content. However, "The Act of Killing" has been widely acclaimed by critics and audiences alike for its unique and thought-provoking approach to exploring a dark period in Indonesian history. The documentary is directed by Joshua Oppenheimer and centers around interviews with the perpetrators of the Indonesian genocide, allowing them to reenact their crimes in a surreal, filmic style. The film has won numerous awards, including the BAFTA Award for Best Documentary, and was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature in 2014.
